name: Simone
description:
This project was made in 2 hours during my second year. For this exercise, I imposed myself several constraints: - A maximum of 2 hours before rendering.  - Not allowed to use an existing project or watch Youtube's video.  - Don't ask for any help. This exercise allowed me to better manage the pressure and to understand a new asset "LeanTween", I use this asset for the song essentially.

This is the link for the audio documentation : 

- http://dentedpixel.com/LeanTweenDocumentation/classes/LeanAudioOptions.html

The game is easy to play, just click on the screen and follow the color sequence.
